message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $13,250?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
